title: Vlad's Q
body: after his rework vlad had to q twice then his 3rd q was the major heal now he gets a stack after using his crimson pact q so he only has to q twice, there is no mention of this change in the patch notes though

replies.body: Pretty sure the one time i played him (after the mage update) that was how it worked.
